post:
Tired of poor quality of service from The Other Guys? Come to IPXcore! We have great service and great true 24/7 support; you'll love us!

We're getting some great feedback on our California location! We're offering a 10% off coupon: **_10OFFSDAPRIL_** This coupon is good for any San Diego product.

Our service for California is out of AIS Lightwave (San Diego).

Some company info:
We've been up and running since May of 2011. We're running OpenVZ virtualization on our very own Dell, HP, and Supermicro -powered hardware.
Each server node has its own 100mbit connection. 
Past-30-days support ticket mean response time: 0 Day(s) 0 Hour(s) 16 Minute(s) and 27 Second(s)

**_The plans:_**

**IronVZ:**
192mb of RAM
32mb of vSwap
15gb of disk space
300gb of monthly transfer
1 IPv4 address

<s>$2.49/month</s> **$2.24/month** with coupon code 10OFFSDAPRIL

San Diego, CA: <a href="https://billingcp.us/cart.php?a=add&pid=79&carttpl=modern3&systpl=ipx3">HERE</a>

**BronzeVZ:**
256mb of RAM
64mb of vSwap
20gb of disk space
500gb of monthly transfer
1 IPv4 address

<s>$3.99/month</s> **$3.59/month** with coupon code 10OFFSDAPRIL

San Diego, CA: <a href="https://billingcp.us/cart.php?a=add&pid=80&carttpl=modern3&systpl=ipx3">HERE</a>

**CopperVZ:**
512mb of RAM
96mb of vSwap
35gb of disk space
750gb of monthly transfer
1 IPv4 address

<s>$6.99/month</s> **$6.29/month** with coupon code 10OFFSDAPRIL

San Diego, CA: <a href="https://billingcp.us/cart.php?a=add&pid=81&carttpl=modern3&systpl=ipx3">HERE</a>

All of our other California Premium OpenVZ plans are eligible for this coupon code, but do not meet LET pricing guidelines.

FYI: As outlined in the AUP/TOS ( http://ipxcore.com/auptos/ ), all new registrations MUST be made with verifiable postal address information. Repeating your province/state in the address fields will cause your account to be suspended til you update your account information. These plans are auto-verified with Maxmind; if you get auto-tagged for fraud, open a support ticket for resolution. All plans are also subject to manual verifications.

You are encouraged to exercise the 3-day trial period (outlined in http://ipxcore.com/auptos/ in the Billing section ) and determine if this service will be right for you.

California test ip: 209.112.254.18

We also do custom plans. Please contact us with your requirements.
